item.title: How to install Alacritty in Linux Mint
item.description: I recently switched to Alacritty on my laptop and wanted to share how to get it up and running. Alacritty, much like kitty and wezterm, is a GPU accelerated terminal emulator. It is also the lightest and the fastest among the three and it plays well with TMUX which is a must for me. Screenshot of my terminal Install Steps Alacritty is not in APT so we can’t simply do apt install alacritty.
